channels.name: ğŸ“œâ”ƒrules
channels.topic: Detailed server rules and guidelines

pin.title: ğŸ“œ Server Rules & Guidelines
pin.description: Please read and follow these rules to maintain a positive gaming environment for everyone.

fields.name: ğŸ¤ General Behavior
fields.value:
â€¢ **Be Respectful:** Treat all members with kindness and respect
â€¢ **No Harassment:** Bullying, trolling, or harassment will not be tolerated
â€¢ **No Spam:** Avoid excessive messages, emojis, or mentions
â€¢ **Stay On Topic:** Use channels for their intended purpose

fields.name: ğŸ® Gaming Rules
fields.value:
â€¢ **Fair Play:** No cheating, exploiting, or unfair advantages
â€¢ **Sportsmanship:** Be a good winner and loser
â€¢ **Teamwork:** Work together and help new players
â€¢ **Respect Opponents:** Trash talk is fine, but keep it friendly

fields.name: ğŸ“ Content Guidelines
fields.value:
â€¢ **No NSFW:** Keep content appropriate for all ages
â€¢ **No Self-Promotion:** Use #self-promotion for your content
â€¢ **Respect Copyright:** Don't share copyrighted material
â€¢ **Quality Content:** Share meaningful and relevant content

fields.name: ğŸ”‡ Voice Chat Rules
fields.value:
â€¢ **No Background Noise:** Use push-to-talk when possible
â€¢ **Respect Others:** Don't interrupt or talk over others
â€¢ **Appropriate Language:** Keep language clean and friendly
â€¢ **No Music Bots:** Use music channels for music

fields.name: âš–ï¸ Enforcement
fields.value:
â€¢ **Warnings:** First offense usually results in a warning
â€¢ **Timeouts:** Temporary restrictions for repeated offenses
â€¢ **Bans:** Permanent removal for severe violations
â€¢ **Appeals:** Contact staff if you believe you were treated unfairly

footer.text: Rules are subject to change. Check back regularly!
